headline: Software companies are 'overly maligned,' analyst says
summary: Palantir (PLTR) reported fourth quarter earnings on Monday that beat Wall Street's expectations. DA Davidson head of technology research Gil Luria joins Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to discuss the overall software sector, whether he thinks it will continue to struggle, and how Palantir fits into the space. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Datadog Weighs OpenAI Workload Risk Against AI Growth And Valuation
summary: Analysts are flagging a potential risk that OpenAI could shift some monitoring and observability workloads away from Datadog's platform. At the same time, Datadog is gaining attention for its use of AI in IT operations, with several analysts recently calling NasdaqGS:DDOG a top pick in software. These crosscurrents come as investors watch for any impact on growth and AI traction ahead of Datadog's upcoming earnings announcement. For you as an investor, the tension between possible OpenAI...
